author: Reuters Editorial
title: CORRECTED-BRIEF-Yihua Healthcare Aims To Raise Up To 3 Bln Yuan Via Share Placement
text:
(Corrects company name in snaps and headline)
May 2 (Reuters) - Yihua Healthcare Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT AIMS TO RAISE UP TO 3.0 BILLION YUAN ($471.88 million) IN SHARE PLACEMENT
* SAYS IT SCRAPS SHARE PLACEMENT PROPOSAL ANNOUNCED IN 2017 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2JLuyks ; bit.ly/2jm7jCg Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3576 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
